title: Sonic Boom
description: Sally receives a message from her father. She pinpoints his location in the dark swamp.

title: Sonic and Sally
description: Sally is captured and Robotnik creates a clone in order to track down Knothole, the freedom fighters home.

title: Ultra Sonic
description: With the help of his roboticized Uncle Chuck, Sonic and the others try to stop Robotnik's plan to use a giant crystal to replace his oil supply.

title: Sonic and the Secret Scrolls
description: Sonic and the others head for the Maga Temple to find the secret scrolls.

title: Super Sonic
description: Dr. Robotnik discovers the hiding place of the wizard Lazar and steals his computer of magic spells. Now Sonic must return the computer.

title: Sonic Racer
description: Robotnik challenges Sonic to a race against his racer-bot.

title: Harmonic Sonic
description: When Robotnik launches a spy-orb that will uncover the Freedom Fighter's Knothole location, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy-sphere aboard a home-made rocket powered by Robotnik's discarded booster engine that fell in the Great Forest. Once on the heavily guarded sphere, Sonic and Robot must find the spy sensors before they locate Knothole.

title: Hooked on Sonics
description: Antoine becomes jealous of Sonic and Sally together so he sneaks out a power ring so he can defeat Robotnik and capture Sally's heart.

title: Sonic's Nightmare
description: Sonic is haunted by a vivid nightmare he once had of Sally being roboticized, and it interferes with his duties as a freedom fighter.

title: Warp Sonic
description: While sneaking around Robotropolis, Sonic, Sally, and Antoine meet Griff, the leader of the freedom fighter group of Lower Mobius.

title: Sub-Sonic
description: Robotnik severely upsets the ecosystem above and below the surface, when he sends explosive, Robotnik snake probes drilling deep under ground in search of oil lakes. After being swept into an underground world by a whirlpool, Sonic, Sally, Antoine and Robot discover a strange creature who claims he is the last of a people who have been destroyed by surface creatures and blames the Freedom Fighters for his plight. Robot gets a chance to become a hero for a change, when he saves Sonic and the others from a toxic pot of techno-junk, but it's up to the Hedgehog to turn the tables on Robotnik and destroy his drilling platform and team of lethal sn

title: Sonic Past Cool
description: Tails makes friends with a baby Tarapod. Now, the freedom fighters must protect the Tarapod's family from Robotnik.

title: Heads or Tails
description: Tails has always idolized Sonic. Now he gets to go on a mission with him.

title: Sonic Conversion
description: The Freedom Fighters, with new addition, Dulcy, develop a De-Roboti-sizer and try it out on Bunnie. It's a success and, against Sally's wishes, Sonic battles Robotnik's newest weapon - a Virtual Reality Shriek-Bot - and impulsively brings Uncle Chuck back to Knothole to de-roboti-size him. All goes well until Bunnie suddenly reverts and the De-Roboti-sizer explodes. Then, they discover Uncle Chuck has reverted, too, and that he has Tails and Antoine with him. Sonic races to the rescue, in the process destroying the new Shriek-Bot, and "reaches" Uncle Chuck, who decides to remain in Robotropolis, pretending to be roboti-sized in order to spy for the Freedom Fighters.

title: Game Guy
description: The Freedom Fighters run into a Swashbuckler, named Ari, battling Swat-Bots. Sonic diverts them, allowing Ari to escape. After hearing that Robotnik is holding his band of Freedom Fighters hostage, Ari decides to help Sonic free them

title: No Brainer
description: While freeing a group of freedom fighters, Sonic is hit and loses his memory. With Robotnik away, Snively sees this as a chance to find the freedom fighter base and return to Robotnik's good side.

title: Blast to the Past: Part 1
description: Tired of facing defeat at the hands of the evil Dr. Robotnik, Sonic and Sally time-travel to the past in an effort to stop his takeover of the planet.

title: Blast to the Past: Part 2
description: Robotnik rises to power and begins enslaving the planet.

title: Fed Up with Antoine/Ghost Busted
description: Sonic and the others are sick of Antoine's screw ups. But when a biker gang shows up and worships Antoine, Antoine believes he is starting to get the respect he deserves. / Sonic's ghost stories leaves Tails scared and paranoid.

title: Dulcy
description: Robotnik is interested in Dulcy and wonders how many more dragons there are.

title: The Void
description: The Void reopens and captures Sally and Bunny Rabbot. When Sonic goes in after them, he meets Naugus, one of Robotnik's rivals.

title: The Odd Couple/Ro-Becca
description: In "The Odd Couple", Antoine and Sonic form a comical duo as they have to cope with living together after a brutal snowstorm. In "Ro-Becca", Antoine has to deal with an obsessive robot that Rotor created which has fallen in love with him.

title: Cry of the Wolf
description: Using Sally's father's list, Sonic and the others meet up with a freedom fighter group known as, the Wolf Pack. Now, they must work together to destroy Robotnik's new Test Pod.

title: Drood Henge
description: Robotnik is looking for two sacred stones that will help power his Doomsday Device. Sonic, Tails, Sally, and Dulcy must get to the stones first.

title: Spyhog
description: Sonic and the gang have been sabotaging Robotnik's plans for a long time. Now Robotnik is beginning to think their is a spy in his ranks. Could Uncle Chuck's cover be blown?

title: The Doomsday Project
description: When Robotnik activates the "Doomsday Machine", Freedom Fighters from every zone of Mobius team up to destroy it, leading to a climactic showdown with Robotnik.
